verbose_text: Therefore, we designed an ex vivo bead assay in which we challenged slices of embryonic forebrain in which HS was enzymatically removed (Heparanase treatment) or lacking functional HS modifying enzymes Hs2st (Hs2st -/- tissue) or Hs6st1 (Hs6st1 -/- tissue) with a constant amount of Fgf8 to probe the formation of a Fgf8 protein gradient through time.
